title: Great Software Engineer Simulator
description: Based on research from "What Makes a Great Software Engineer" by Paul Luo Li

title: Interactive Computer Simulator
description: Computer simulator that will help you learn how computers work from the fundamentals

title: Interactive Assembly Simulator
description: Interactive Assembly Simulator that demonstrates how assembly code works at the hardware level.

title: Interactive B-Tree Simulator
description: Interactive B-Tree simulator that helps you understand how B-Trees operate.

title: Interactive Compiler Simulator
description: Interactive compiler simulator that visualizes the complete compilation process from source code to executable.

title: Operating System Concepts Simulator
description: Concepts of kernel mode vs. user mode, multi-threading, synchronization primitives, and their implementations

title: Interative TCP/IP visualization
description: Interactive TCP/IP visualization that allows you to explore the fundamental concepts of internet communication.

title: Thinking Fast and Slow: Interactive Simulation
description: Explore cognitive biases based on Daniel Kahneman's work in the field of psychology

title: LLM Agent Architecture Simulator
description: This will visualize how various agent workflows process tasks.

title: Node.js Event Loop Simulator
description: This interactive Node.js Event Loop Simulator demonstrates how JavaScript code is executed in Node.js.

title: CPU vs GPU Simulator
description: This will visualize the key architectural differences and processing patterns of these two important computing components.

title: PHP Code Execution Simulator
description: Interactive PHP code execution simulator that will help you visualize how PHP code gets processed and executed
